mapper.sql: SELECT CATEGORY, NO, PRODUCTNAME, PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTUNIT, PRODUCTDELIVERY, PRODUCTCOUNT, PRODUCTPRODUCTION, PRODUCTIMAGE FROM BMSTOREPRODUCT
mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY, NO, PRODUCTNAME, B.PRODUCTCODE PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTUNIT, PRODUCTDELIVERY, PRODUCTCOUNT, PRODUCTPRODUCTION, PRODUCTIMAGE FROM BMSTOREPRODUCT B,( SELECT PRODUCTCODE FROM( SELECT CATEGORY, NO, PRODUCTNAME, B.PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTPRICE, PRODUCTUNIT, PRODUCTDELIVERY, PRODUCTCOUNT, PRODUCTPRODUCTION, PRODUCTIMAGE FROM BMSTOREPRODUCT B, ORDERLIST O WHERE B.PRODUCTCODE = O.PRODUCTCODE AND O.OWNERNO = #{ownerno}) GROUP BY PRODUCTCODE )G WHERE B.PRODUCTCODE = G.PRODUCTCODE

SELECT B.CATEGORY CATEGORY, B.NO NO, B.PRODUCTNAME PRODUCTNAME, B.PRODUCTCODE PRODUCTCODE, B.PRODUCTPRICE PRODUCTPRICE, B.PRODUCTUNIT PRODUCTUNIT, B.PRODUCTDELIVERY PRODUCTDELIVERY, B.PRODUCTCOUNT PRODUCTCOUNT, B.PRODUCTPRODUCTION PRODUCTPRODUCTION, B.PRODUCTIMAGE PRODUCTIMAGE FROM BMSTOREPRODUCT B, BMEVENT E WHERE B.PRODUCTCODE=E.PRODUCTCODE AND ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 2

SELECT E.NO NO, E.PRODUCTCODE PRODUCTCODE, E.STARTDATE STARTDATE, E.ENDDATE ENDDATE, E.AMOUNT AMOUNT, E.SALE SALE, P.PRODUCTNAME PRODUCTNAME, P.PRODUCTPRICE PRODUCTPRICE, P.PRODUCTUNIT PRODUCTUNIT, P.PRODUCTIMAGE PRODUCTIMAGE FROM BMEVENT E, BMSTOREPRODUCT P WHERE E.PRODUCTCODE=P.PRODUCTCODE AND E.ENDDATE>SYSDATE ORDER BY E.ENDDATE, E.STARTDATE

SELECT RM,CATEGORY, NO,PRODUCTNAME, B.PRODUCTCODE PRODUCTCODE, PRODUCTPRICE,PRODUCTUNIT,PRODUCTDELIVERY,PRODUCTCOUNT, PRODUCTPRODUCTION,PRODUCTIMAGE FROM BMSTOREPRODUCT B,( SELECT ROWNUM RM, PRODUCTCODE, COUNT FROM( SELECT PRODUCTCODE, SUM(ORDERAMOUNT) COUNT FROM ORDERLIST GROUP BY PRODUCTCODE ORDER BY SUM(ORDERAMOUNT) DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 19) C WHERE B.PRODUCTCODE=C.PRODUCTCODE ORDER BY RM
